other_tests.findings: Echogenic portal triads suggestive of periportal edema. Gallbladder wall is thickened and edematous, distended with several small gallstones. No focal liver lesions or textural abnormality. No evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary duct dilation. The common bile duct measures 2 mm. The spleen measures 9.6 cm and is unremarkable. The pancreas is unremarkable.
